preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 32.5 g of Acetic Acid using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh 28.9 g of Silver using the balance. 
 3. Weigh 65.0 g of Arsenic carefully, using appropriate safety measures (gloves, goggles). 
 4. Weigh 1.0 g of Magnesium.

 6. Gradually add Silver to the mixture, ensuring uniform distribution. 
 7. Finally, add Magnesium to the mixture and stir thoroughly until all components are well mixed.
